heroSummary: BSc Computer Security and Digital Forensics student seeking internship/attachment roles in cybersecurity, SOC operations, networking, and IT support.
about: I am a Computer Security and Digital Forensics undergraduate at JOOUST with practical exposure to network deployment, system support, and security tooling including Kali Linux and Splunk. I actively build hands-on capability through cybersecurity labs and CTF competitions, strengthening practical problem-solving, security analysis, and operational readiness for internship or attachment roles.
